actions.text: On agreeing to the Shaw amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment allows local and State governments to access Department of Justice information for the purpose of doing criminal background checks on port employees or applicants to become port employees.
purpose: An amendment, numbered 6 and printed in the Congressional Record, to allow a State, county, port authority or other local jurisdiction to conduct criminal background checks on employees or applicants for employment.
